content: The Apollo astronauts brought back samples from the Moon. These are stored at which space center?

The Apollo astronauts brought back lunar samples during their missions to the Moon, and these samples are primarily stored at the NASA Johnson Space Center (JSC) in Houston, Texas. The Lunar Sample Laboratory Facility at JSC is a specialized facility designed to preserve and study these precious materials. The samples include rocks, soil, and core samples that have been carefully curated and distributed for scientific research around the world.
